doc: s3 presign works in docker image 0.12.7 but not in latest
# Type of request: This is a ...
S3 Presigned urls worked for us using docker localstack image 0.12.7. They don't work for us in 'latest'
2. Create a presigned URL for a file in that bucket
Then you should get a 404 response
Doing steps 1 to 3 we instead get a 403 with the error message:
The request signature we calculated does not match the signature you provided.                     Check your key and signing method.
## Client code (AWS SDK code snippet, or sequence of "awslocal" commands)
# feed presigned URL into a curl command to see the result
With 0.12.7 you get a 404 like this (expected):
With 'latest' you get a 403 like this (actual):
SignatureDoesNotMatchThe request signature we calculated does not match the signature you provided. Check your key and signing method.b0a266464a2d9f8ftest......
